title: Amazon Linux 2023 - ALAS2023-2025-879: Medium priority package update for ecs-init
description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2023 that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2024-45338:
	An attacker can craft an input to the Parse functions that would be processed non-linearly with respect to its length, resulting in extremely slow parsing. This could cause a denial of service.
